attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I BELIEVE IT IS ABSOLUTELY SCANDALOUS THAT £47 MILLION POUND IS BEING PAID TO THOUSANDS OF CIVIL SERVANTS IN THE MOD ( POSSIBLY FOR SAVING MONEY THAT SHOULD BE SPENT ON OUR BRAVE TROOPS ON THE FRONT LINE )WHEN IT IS CLAIMED THAT BUDGETS AT SO TIGHT. WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME A CIVIL SERVANT WAS ON THE FRONT LINE WITH OUR BRAVE AND HEROIC TROOPS? I BELIEVE THIS IS YET ANOTHER EPISODE WHERE THE GOVERNMENT IS TOTALLY OUT OF TOUCH WITH THE ONCE PROUD BRITISH PUBLIC

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
